channel.title: Can anyone help me please!
channel.description: hi everyone i cant find any tuts on how to code the bomb command in my server. i really want it. and i was wondering if anyone can send me eaither a tut or code. please and thank you.

item.title: Can anyone help me please!
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

Im trying to figure this out 2, and im asking sum 1 if my code is right. If mines right and works, i might post it here. But dude, in ur last post. lol they dissed u so bad lol.

U didnt code ur server from scratch, u just edited a ton of things. It would take months to code THE WHOLE THING by yourself. So thats one of the reasons why they dissed u so bad lol.

But ya, it was funny and i might post my bomb code here if i figure it out.[br][size=1]Posted on: 03 August 2007, 16:43:31[/size][hr]If i wanted to have a bomb animation on the people who it hits, is this right?

stillgfx(287, enemyY2, enemyX2); // 287 = HUGE Explosion

}

Dunno if its what your looking for all it does is ’ bomb ’ a certain amout of people in a certain area
